greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Continued fraction for 2*zeta(3).
reference: Y. V. Nesterenko, Some remarks on zeta(3), Mathematical Notes, 59 (No. 6, 1996), 625-636.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
Y. V. Nesterenko, Zeta(3) and recurrence relations.
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(2*zeta(3)); for (n=1, 20000, write("b060804.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 12 2009
xref: Cf. A152648 Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 12 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 29 2001
